#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

char s[10000010],k[11];

int main()
{ 
	long t,n,i,j,z,count,x,len,flag,index;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>k;
		x=0;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			x+=sprintf(s+x,"%ld",i);
		}
		//s[z]='\0';
		count=0;
		for(i=0;i<x;i++)
		{
			if(s[i]==k[0])
			{
				if(strncmp(k,s+i,strlen(k))==0)
					count++;
			}
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
		
	}	
	return 0;
}
